Class WavPcmStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • com.cogi.audioprocessor.PcmStream
        • com.cogi.audioprocessor.WavPcmStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class WavPcmStream
extends PcmStream
    PcmStream for getting PCM data from a WAV file.
